channel.title: Bluurs Clan chat Button?
channel.description:
Every time i click on Clan chat the ignores Redstone gets activated like this:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lxxpgh.jpg[/img]
How i fix it? (Using bluurs client).

item.title: Bluurs Clan chat Button?
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

48 Jumps:

It’s either doing it because it doesn’t have a clan-chat red-stone. I DOUBT that’s the case. If it is I can make you a red-stone and send it to you. OR it might be doing it because the clicking on your clan-chat stone is messed up. Actually it’s probably just because you have no clan-chat red-stone. Also if your working on a project with so many people shouldn’t you be experienced in fixing things that are messed up? That’s probably the biggest part in any kind of programming. When you want that red-stone PM me and it’s yours.

I already got the red stone lol but it doesn’t work.

Read full topic
